entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
